pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, September 30, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, September 30, 2016:

Jerusalem

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the funeral service for former Israeli Prime Minister and President, Shimon Peres.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Excellency Benjamin Netanyahu, Prime Minister of the State of Israel.

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Excellency Reuven Rivlin, President of the State of Israel.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

Please note: all times are local

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
